name: The Labours of Heracles
description:
The game follows the courageous Labors of Heracles. You, the player, take on an adventure of deadly trials, meant to test your perception, agility, strength, and intellect. As a demi-god you have powers to defeat mythical Greek creatures, which will let you take your place in the Pantheon, and to live among all the other Gods.  Goal - Kill the enemy and pass the parkour  

Movement: WAD or arrow keys
Fighting:  Left click  Jumping: Space 

After playing the DEMO please fill in this survey <3 :  Survey
